automation_yaml:
id: 'office_wled_living_room_time_routine'
alias: Office WLED and Living Room Time Routine
description: "Time-based Office WLED and Living Room light routine with 5-second delay after actions"
mode: single
trigger:
  - platform: time_pattern
    minutes: '/1'
conditions: []
action:
  - choose:
      - conditions:
          - condition: template
            value_template: "{{ now().hour >= 6 and now().hour < 9 }}"
        sequence:
          - service: light.turn_on
            target:
              entity_id: light.wled
            data:
              brightness_pct: 50
              rgb_color:
                - 255
                - 160
                - 80
          - service: light.turn_off
            target:
              entity_id: light.living_room_2
          - delay: '00:00:05'
      - conditions:
          - condition: template
            value_template: "{{ now().hour >= 17 and now().hour < 20 }}"
        sequence:
          - service: light.turn_on
            target:
              entity_id: light.living_room_2
            data:
              brightness: 204
              rgb_color:
                - 200
                - 220
                - 255
          - service: light.turn_on
            target:
              entity_id: light.wled
            data:
              brightness_pct: 100
              rgb_color:
                - 200
                - 220
                - 255
          - delay: '00:00:05'
      - conditions:
          - condition: template
            value_template: "{{ now().hour >= 21 }}"
        sequence:
          - service: light.turn_on
            target:
              entity_id: light.wled
            data:
              brightness_pct: 20
              rgb_color:
                - 255
                - 120
                - 40
          - service: light.turn_off
            target:
              entity_id: light.living_room_2
          - delay: '00:00:05'
